<h3>What's in the SDK</h3>
  * SharpKit C# to JavaScript compiler
  * Assemblies for C# to JavaScript development
  * Visual Studio templates
  * Code samples

Review the program folder (typically "c:\Program Files\SharpKit") to find the assemblies and code samples. 

Visual Studio templates are installed to your project templates folder (typically "My Documents\Visual Studio 2008\Templates\ProjectTemplates\Visual C#\SharpKit") and will appear under the SharpKit category on the New Project Dialog.

<h3>System requirement</h3>
  * Windows XP / Vista/ 7 / 2003 Server / 2008 Server (32bit or 64bit)
  * Microsoft .NET framework 3.5

<h3>Installing SharpKit SDK</h3>
Download the installer, double-click the file, and follow the setup wizard instructions.
